heroTitle: Your reliable operator in the precious metals market
heroDescription: We strive to offer you the most favorable conditions in the precious metals market, ensuring a reliable and successful partnership.
aboutCompanyDescription: LLC 'Kasmet' is your reliable operator in the precious metals market. Our company specializes in trading precious metals and technical products made from them, including gold, silver, platinum, palladium, rhodium, and iridium. We are also actively involved in the purchase and sale of scrap precious metals. We strive to offer you the most favorable conditions in the precious metals market, ensuring reliable and successful partnership.
reliabilityDescription: We have all the necessary permits and extensive experience in the precious metals sector.
expertiseDescription: We provide expert services, guaranteeing an objective assessment of the quality and authenticity of metals.
individualApproachDescription: We work with both private clients and corporate partners, offering unique solutions tailored to each client's needs.
collaborateTitle: By collaborating with us, you can expect:
finishedAnodesSilver: Bimetallic Products Based on Gold and Its Alloys (Au-Ni, Au-Cu, Au-Pd, Au-Pl, Au-Sn, Au-Sn-Pb)
finishedBimetallicProducts: Products Made from Palladium, Platinum, and Their Alloys (Pd-Sn, Pd-Ni, Pd-Sn-Ni, Pt-Pd-Rh-Ru)
finishedPalladiumPlatinum: Soldering Materials of Precious Metals (Sn-Pd, Sn-Pd-Mn, Sn-Pd-Ag, Sn, Sn-Pd, Sn-Pl)
scrapPurchaseDescription: We purchase scrap from individuals and legal entities:
rawMaterialsTitle: Purchase and processing of raw materials
worldDescription: We have the capability and experience to deliver to friendly countries.
contact_value_placeholder: Enter your email or phone number
footer_description: Kasmet LLC is your reliable operator in the precious metals market. We specialize in trading precious metals and technical products made from them.
